summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing an interview related to a story. Jes Staley, identified as the CEO of an investment bank, responds to Epstein's inquiry about the interview, indicating that there is no role for him at the moment. The email contains a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the CEO of an investment bank and is responding to Jeffrey Epstein's inquiry about an interview.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is inquiring about the status of a story's interview, indicating his involvement in the matter.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO, is in a position of authority over Jeffrey Epstein, who is seeking information regarding an interview.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of an investment bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is inquiring about an interview related to a story.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.
